sentences.english: His painting is an exact copy of the original.
sentences.chinese: 他的画是与原作丝毫不差的临摹作品。

sentences.english: The facts mentioned in the report tally to every detail.
sentences.chinese: 报告中所提到的事实都丝毫不差。

sentences.english: His conduct was nothing short of madness.
sentences.chinese: 他的行为与疯狂丝毫不差。

sentences.english: His painting is a/an exact copy of the original.
sentences.chinese: 他的画是与原作丝毫不差的临摹作品。
